feed.title: Kanba Releases

entry.title: New release for Kanba: Some UI Improvements
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Auto-translate README and Wiki by @DASILVA0000 in https://github.com/Uaghazade1/kanba/pull/2
  • Fix/UI enhancement dashboard by @bkanishka004 in https://github.com/Uaghazade1/kanba/pull/4

New Contributors

  • @DASILVA0000 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Uaghazade1/kanba/pull/2
  • @bkanishka004 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Uaghazade1/kanba/pull/4

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Uaghazade1/kanba/compare/1.0.1...1.0.2

entry.title: New release for Kanba: Added Public Share Link to Projects
New release for Kanba: Added Bookmarks
New release for Kanba: Introducing Bookmarks.
entry.content: Introducing Bookmarks: Easy way to add and manage your personal links.

entry.title: New release for Kanba: Added PostgreSQL/Prisma Support
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • design [no issue]: update home page and notification-center ui by @divyanshudhruv in https://github.com/Kanba-co/kanba/pull/6
  • feat: Add optional PostgreSQL support with Prisma ORM by @Jeelislive in https://github.com/Kanba-co/kanba/pull/7

New Contributors

  • @divyanshudhruv made their first contribution in https://github.com/Kanba-co/kanba/pull/6
  • @Jeelislive made their first contribution in https://github.com/Kanba-co/kanba/pull/7

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Kanba-co/kanba/compare/1.0.5...1.06
